Modesto.Gallo Center for the Arts: The Gallo Center for the Arts is a performing arts center located on 1000 I Street in downtown Modesto, California. Opened in September 2007, the Arts Center hosts different Resident Companies, like the Modesto Symphony Orchestra, Central West Ballet, Townsend Opera Players and the Modesto Community Concerts Association. The list of stars that have performed at the Center began on its opening day on September 27, 2007 with Patti LuPone being the first star to perform on the larger Mary Stuart Rogers Theater.
